CODE             	LONG DESCRIPTION            	SHORT DESCRIPTION    
A            	TORNADO                          	TORN                       
B            	HURRICANE                        	HURR                       
C       	MOUNTAIN WAVE                    	WAVE                       
D            	FRONTAL ACTIVITY                 	FRTA                      
E            	LINE SQUALL                      	SQAL                      
F            	FOG                              	FOG                        
G            	WIND                             	WIND                      
H           	LIGHT RAIN                      	LTRN                      
I            	LIGHT FREEZING RAIN              	LFZR                       
J            	HEAVY RAIN                       	HVRN                       
K            	HEAVY FREEZING RAIN              	HFZR                       
L            	LOW CEILING                      	CEIL                       
M            	HEAVY SNOW                       	HSNO                       
N            	LIGHT SNOW                       	LSNO                       
O            	FREEZING TEMPERATURE             	FZTP                       
P            	FRONTAL PASSAGE                  	FRTP                      
Q            	WHIRLWIND                        	WHIR                     
R            	FROST                            	FRST                      
S            	WEATHER NOT A FACTOR             	NOWX                    
T            	THUNDERSTORM                     	TDST                      
U            	TURBULENCE                       	TURB                     
V            	OTHER                            	OTHR                     
W            	UNKNOWN                          	UNKN                      
99999        	FLY COND-SEC CODE INVALID        	ERROR MESSAGE
